resources:
AMC Settings Ladies\n Lounge Student\n Corner College\n Social Media The AMC app is exclusive mobile app designed and developed for the use of students and staff of AMC Engineering College, Bangalore.\n"string> This App provides quick information about the college and the various activities conducted in the institute. The app also provides access to the knowledge portal - an innovative initiative by AMC to share research works of the faculty at a single for everyone to access.\n\n This is the first version of the app and updates with new features will be released gradually.
"This app is linked to the official website of AMC Group of Institutions. "And is created to give an user interface to the user. All rights reserved by this Institution."
Rakesh Kumar Singh
